aries.personality: Aries is the zodiac's first sign, a natural leader with fiery energy and adventurous spirit.

love.description: Passionate and intense lovers who seek excitement and honesty.

career.description: Driven by competition and leadership roles, Aries thrives in fast-paced jobs.

health.description: High energy levels require regular physical activity; prone to headaches.

aries.dailyHoroscope: Today is a day to take bold steps, but be mindful of impulsiveness.
